languages.text: "Если вы, {mf|господин|госпожа} Фиделио, действительно стоите имени Денза — вы с этими мелкими неурядицами справитесь. Считайте, что я вас благословил. Император защищает. Достойного".

"If you, {mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio, really are worthy of Denz's name — you will deal with these minor vicissitudes. Consider this my blessing. The Emperor protects. Anyone who deserves it, that is."
languages.original_text: "Если вы, {mf|господин|госпожа} Фиделио, действительно стоите имени Денза — вы с этими мелкими неурядицами справитесь. Считайте, что я вас благословил. Император защищает. Достойного".

traits.locale_text: "If you, {mf|Master|Madam} Fidelio, really are worthy of Denz's name — you will deal with these minor vicissitudes. Consider this my blessing. The Emperor protects. Anyone who deserves it, that is."
"If you, {mf|Master|Madam} Fidelio, really are worthy of Denz's name — you will deal with these minor vicissitudes. Consider this my blessing. The Emperor protects. Anyone who deserves it, that is."

"If you, {mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio, really are worthy of Denz's name — you will deal with these minor vicissitudes. Consider this my blessing. The Emperor protects. Anyone who deserves it, that is."

"If you, {mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio, really are worthy of Denz's name — you will deal with these minor vicissitudes. Consider this my blessing. The Emperor protects. Anyone who deserves it, that is."

"If you, {mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio, really are worthy of Denz's name — you will deal with these minor vicissitudes. Consider this my blessing. The Emperor protects. Anyone who deserves it, that is."

languages.text: “如果你，菲迪奥{mf|大师|女士}，真的能配得上丹兹之名，那你一定能处理好这些小小的变故。就把这当成我的祝福吧。帝皇会保护那些值得保护的人，就是这样。”
languages.original_text: "If you, {mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio, really are worthy of Denz's name — you will deal with these minor vicissitudes. Consider this my blessing. The Emperor protects. Anyone who deserves it, that is."

traits.locale_text: “如果你，菲迪奥{mf|大师|女士}，真的能配得上丹兹之名，那你一定能处理好这些小小的变故。就把这当成我的祝福吧。帝皇会保护那些值得保护的人，就是这样。”

languages.text: «Si realmente es digno del legado de Denz, {mf|maestro|maestra} Fidelio, estas vicisitudes menores no supondrán un problema para usted. Considere esto mi bendición. El Emperador protege... a todos los que lo merecen».
languages.original_text: "If you, {mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio, really are worthy of Denz's name — you will deal with these minor vicissitudes. Consider this my blessing. The Emperor protects. Anyone who deserves it, that is."

traits.locale_text: «Si realmente es digno del legado de Denz, {mf|maestro|maestra} Fidelio, estas vicisitudes menores no supondrán un problema para usted. Considere esto mi bendición. El Emperador protege... a todos los que lo merecen».

languages.text: 「{mf|マスター|ミストレス}・フィデリオ、もしあなたが本当にデンツの名にふさわしい者であれば…このような些細な波乱もなんなく乗り越えるはずです。これは私からの祝福です。皇帝があなたをお守りするでしょう。本当にふさわしい人物であれば、ですが」
languages.original_text: "If you, {mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio, really are worthy of Denz's name — you will deal with these minor vicissitudes. Consider this my blessing. The Emperor protects. Anyone who deserves it, that is."

traits.locale_text: 「{mf|マスター|ミストレス}・フィデリオ、もしあなたが本当にデンツの名にふさわしい者であれば…このような些細な波乱もなんなく乗り越えるはずです。これは私からの祝福です。皇帝があなたをお守りするでしょう。本当にふさわしい人物であれば、ですが」

languages.text: "Solltet Ihr, {mf|Herr|Herrin} Fidelio, Denz' Namen tatsächlich würdig sein, dann werdet Ihr mit diesen kleineren Stolpersteinen fertig. Betrachtet dies als meinen Segen. Der Imperator schützt uns. Natürlich nur die, die es verdienen."
languages.original_text: "If you, {mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio, really are worthy of Denz's name — you will deal with these minor vicissitudes. Consider this my blessing. The Emperor protects. Anyone who deserves it, that is."

traits.locale_text: "Solltet Ihr, {mf|Herr|Herrin} Fidelio, Denz' Namen tatsächlich würdig sein, dann werdet Ihr mit diesen kleineren Stolpersteinen fertig. Betrachtet dies als meinen Segen. Der Imperator schützt uns. Natürlich nur die, die es verdienen."

languages.text: « Si vous, {mf|maître|maîtresse} Fidélio, êtes vraiment digne de Denz, vous saurez gérer ces petits désagréments. Considérez mes paroles comme ma bénédiction. L'Empereur protège. Ceux qui le méritent, en tout cas. »
languages.original_text: "If you, {mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio, really are worthy of Denz's name — you will deal with these minor vicissitudes. Consider this my blessing. The Emperor protects. Anyone who deserves it, that is."

traits.locale_text: « Si vous, {mf|maître|maîtresse} Fidélio, êtes vraiment digne de Denz, vous saurez gérer ces petits désagréments. Considérez mes paroles comme ma bénédiction. L'Empereur protège. Ceux qui le méritent, en tout cas. »

languages.text: "Bakın Fidelio {mf|Bey|Hanım}, şayet Denz'in adına layıksanız bu minik pürüzlerin üstesinden gelirsiniz. Bunu bir lütuf olarak görün. İmparator korur... Hak edenleri tabii."
languages.original_text: "If you, {mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio, really are worthy of Denz's name — you will deal with these minor vicissitudes. Consider this my blessing. The Emperor protects. Anyone who deserves it, that is."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Beyefendi|Hanımefendi} Fidelio, Denz'in adını ağzınıza almaya layıksanız bu minik sıkıntıların altından kalkarsınız. Bunu bir lütuf olarak görün. İmparator korur... Hak edenleri tabii."
